typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as short,
		voornaam as string,
		achternaam as string,
		geboortedatum as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> test1
source(output(
		ID as short,
		voornaam as string,
		achternaam as string,
		geboortedatum as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> test3
test1, test3 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 aggregate(groupBy(ID),
	each(match(name !='ID'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sort(asc(ID, true)) ~> Sort1
